Matagot - Cyclades Language: Dutch, English, French, German Players: 2-5 Age: 13+ Duration: 60 to 90 min Weight: 1.900 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: In this latest collaboration between Bruno Cathala and Ludovic Maublanc, players must buy the favor of the Gods in their race to be the first player to build two cities in the Ancient Greek island group known as the Cyclades. Victory requires respect for all the Gods - players cannot afford to sacrifice to only one God, but must pay homage to each of five Gods in turn. Each turn, the players bid for the favors of the Gods, as only one player can have the favor of each God per turn - and each player is also limited to the favor of a single God per turn. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Asmodée (ASM CYC01) In this latest collaboration between Bruno Cathala and Ludovic Maublanc, players must buy the favor of the Gods in their race to be the first player to build two cities in the Ancient Greek island group known as the Cyclades. Victory requires respect for all the Gods - players cannot afford to sacrifice to only one God, but must pay homage to each of five Gods in turn. Each turn, the players bid for the favors of the Gods, as only one player can have the favor of each God per turn - and each player is also limited to the favor of a single God per turn. -Ares allows the movement of player armies and the building of Fortresses. -Poseidon allows players to move their navies and build Ports. -Zeus allows his followers to hire priests and build temples. -Athena provides her worshipers with philosophers and universities. -Apollo increases the income of his worshippers.

Asmodée (ASM CYC01) Be prepared to travel to the Cyclades archpelago during the golden age of the ancient Greece. With the blessing of the Gods of Olympus and the support of Mythological Creatures, recruit troops, build ships, create fortresses and construct metropolises. The struggle to bring your people to their highest glory will be legendary! With Cyclades, Bruno Cathala and Ludovic Maublanc (Mr. Jack, Dice Town) reinvents development and conquest games. In a ninety minutes game, live through an incredible adventure in which soldiers, philosophers, mythological creatures and gods are common.

Asmodee (ASMCYC01) The rise of nations in a land of myth and legend. Beseech the gods of Olympus and release the most powerful mythical creatures of ancient Greece as you claw your way to the top. Build armies and cities, hire scholars and priests, and be the first to build your metropolis. Only by creating the most magnificent cities of all time will you claim your place as the rightful ruler of the Cyclades! Each player in Cyclades will lead his people in their conquest of ancient Greece. Each turn, you must beseech the gods for the right to build ships, train soldiers, or hire priests. Recruit the gorgon or the kraken, the minotaur or the harpy, and use their power to bolster your defenses or destroy your foes. Build mighty fortresses and legendary libraries in your quest to create the most impressive metropolis the world has ever seen. Bruno Cathala and Ludovic Maublanc, the acclaimed designers behind Mr. Jack and Dice Town, present Cyclades, a game of conquest and development in a time of legend. Featuring lush and beautiful art, intricately sculpted plastic figures, and a modular board that scales up to accommodate any number of players, Cyclades will excite and entertain the most demanding fans of strategic and tactical games.

Description: With the blessing of the gods of Olympus and the support of mythological creatures, you will recruit troops, build ships, create fortresses, and construct metropolises. The creators of Cyclades reinvent the development and conquest game. In a 90-minute session, live through incredible adventure in which soldiers, philosophers, mythological creatures, and gods are common! In this latest collaboration between Bruno Cathala and Ludovic Maublanc, players must buy the favor of the gods in their race to be the first player to build two cities in the ancient Greek island group known as the Cyclades. Victory requires respect for all the gods - players cannot afford to sacrifice to only one, but must pay homage to each of the five gods in turn.
Contents: 1 Modular game board 2 special dice 98 gold pieces 16 prosperity markers 4 large God tiles 40 building tiles 10 Metropolises 5 player screens 1 rule book 85 miniatures 50 cards ******************************* Our Philosophy: We are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s that simple. In business for over 5 years, we understand the most critical aspects of ecommerce. Deliver good value, keep you posted on that status of your order and be available for help should the need arise. Description: All games are new and still in factory shrink-wrap. How to place an Order? Via the BoardGameGeek “shopping cart” Note: If this is your first purchase on BoardGameGeek, Go to http://boardgamegeek.com/wiki/page/Marketplace_Buyer_Guide for more information. Payment: Payment via PayPal “Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com” (PayPal Verified) Shipping: Griffin’s Toy Chest ships via USPS (2-3 day service) or Fed-Ex Ground (2-5 business days) to anywhere within the United States. You will receive a price quote for each shipping option and you choose which of these two shipping option best fits your needs. All shipments are made within 2-3 days of receiving your cleared PayPal payment. Note: feel free to combine items to reduce shipping cost. Returns: Our return policy mirrors our philosophy; we are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! You may return any unopened item within 30 days of delivery for a full refund of the purchase price less shipping costs. Simply contact us to make return arrangements. Note: if an item is damaged in transit, an item exchange will be made at no additional cost to the buyer. Note that we take special pains to package all of your items properly but in the event of the unforeseen, we have you covered!
Contact: Please contact us via email: Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com: phone (M-F 9 AM -6PM EST) 1-888-228-3716; or mail: Griffins Toy Chest, P.O. Box 13731, Fairlawn, OH 44313

Asmodee (ASMCYC01) The rise of nations in a land of myth and legend. Beseech the gods of Olympus and release the most powerful mythical creatures of ancient Greece as you claw your way to the top. Build armies and cities, hire scholars and priests, and be the first to build your metropolis. Only by creating the most magnificent cities of all time will you claim your place as the rightful ruler of the Cyclades! Each player in Cyclades will lead his people in their conquest of ancient Greece. Each turn, you must beseech the gods for the right to build ships, train soldiers, or hire priests. Recruit the gorgon or the kraken, the minotaur or the harpy, and use their power to bolster your defenses or destroy your foes. Build mighty fortresses and legendary libraries in your quest to create the most impressive metropolis the world has ever seen. Bruno Cathala and Ludovic Maublanc, the acclaimed designers behind Mr. Jack and Dice Town, present Cyclades, a game of conquest and development in a time of legend. Featuring lush and beautiful art, intricately sculpted plastic figures, and a modular board that scales up to accommodate any number of players, Cyclades will excite and entertain the most demanding fans of strategic and tactical games.

Asmodee (ASMCYC01) The rise of nations in a land of myth and legend. Beseech the gods of Olympus and release the most powerful mythical creatures of ancient Greece as you claw your way to the top. Build armies and cities, hire scholars and priests, and be the first to build your metropolis. Only by creating the most magnificent cities of all time will you claim your place as the rightful ruler of the Cyclades! Each player in Cyclades will lead his people in their conquest of ancient Greece. Each turn, you must beseech the gods for the right to build ships, train soldiers, or hire priests. Recruit the gorgon or the kraken, the minotaur or the harpy, and use their power to bolster your defenses or destroy your foes. Build mighty fortresses and legendary libraries in your quest to create the most impressive metropolis the world has ever seen. Bruno Cathala and Ludovic Maublanc, the acclaimed designers behind Mr. Jack and Dice Town, present Cyclades, a game of conquest and development in a time of legend. Featuring lush and beautiful art, intricately sculpted plastic figures, and a modular board that scales up to accommodate any number of players, Cyclades will excite and entertain the most demanding fans of strategic and tactical games.
